[February 4th, 2021 5:17 AM] duc: ```function! CopyHover()
  let l:hover = join(CocAction('getHover'))
  if empty(l:hover) | echoerr "No Hover!" | return | endif
  let @+ = l:hover
  let @* = l:hover
  echom "Hover copied!"
endfunction

nnoremap <silent> <leader>k :call CopyHover()<CR>```
私はこうマッピングした
attachments.text:
```function! CopyHover()
  let l:hover = join(CocAction('getHover'))
  if empty(l:hover) | echoerr "No Hover!" | return | endif
  let @+ = l:hover
  let @* = l:hover
  echom "Hover copied!"
endfunction

nnoremap <silent> <leader>k :call CopyHover()<CR>```
私はこうマッピングした
